process.title: Channel Management Process
process.headline: Verify various channels easily with an emoji key
process.description: Audionyx provides a safe and simple emoji‑key verification across platforms like YouTube, TikTok, and Instagram. From registration to payout, everything is automated so you can start monetizing right away.
process.copyrightNotice: To allocate accurate music royalties to you, please provide links to short‑form content where you used Audionyx tracks.

guide.notice: Verification is not processed on weekends and public holidays, and will be handled on the next business day.
guide.emojiKeyCopyDesc: After channel registration, safely copy your issued emoji key to the clipboard.
guide.emojiKeySetup: Place the emoji key in the correct position for each platform.
guide.youtubeDesc: Add the emoji key to your channel description.
guide.youtubeSteps: YouTube Studio → Settings → Channel → Basic info → Description
guide.tiktokDesc: Add the emoji key to your profile bio.
guide.tiktokSteps: Edit profile → Bio → Add emoji key
guide.instagramDesc: Add the emoji key to your profile bio.
guide.instagramSteps: Edit profile → Bio → Add emoji key
guide.autoVerificationDesc: Once setup is complete, the system verifies automatically and monetization starts immediately upon approval.
